export var generateLesson=function generateLesson(){var initialUnits=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";var numberOfUnits=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:60;var unitsForSpace=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:4;var generatedLesson="";if(initialUnits[0].length>1){for(var i=0;i<numberOfUnits;i++){var randomWord=initialUnits[Math.floor(Math.random()*initialUnits.length)];generatedLesson+=" "+randomWord;}return generatedLesson.slice(1);}else{for(var _i=0;_i<numberOfUnits;_i++){var generateLetter=initialUnits[Math.floor(Math.random()*initialUnits.length)];generatedLesson+=generateLetter;// RegEx delete all already created spaces
if(generatedLesson.replace(/ /g,'').length%unitsForSpace===0){generatedLesson+=" ";}}return generatedLesson;}};
